name: Absence (itch) (Turtledilian)
description:
Made in a week for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3.

My first Game Jam!

Beware the light! The Great Tower holds the Fire that shines upon the world. Extinguish it and bathe the world in shadow! The less light there is the stronger you are. Do not be deceived by its beauty.

Mouse Recommended 

WASD: Movement

E: Pick Up Bucket

Left Mouse: Attack

Right Mouse: Water Bolt

Windows versions are less laggy.
